author: TechRadar India Bureau
title: Zoom user-base up by 50% in 3 weeks
description: The videoconferencing platform continues to see a spurt in its usage despite growing concerns over its security and safety.
content: Many countries and companies have come down on the usage of Zoom. But with social distancing and work from home being more or less the norm across the world, the Zoom platform continues to be popular, and the company has reported a 50% rise in the use of the … [+2347 chars]
